    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Italian Theatre in Translation &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>

     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20453283">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20453283">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20453283">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20453283">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20453283" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20453284">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20453284">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20453284">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20453284">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20453284" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20453285">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20453285">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20453285">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (good for generating topics and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20453285">
          <div id="boxatt20453285" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23862897">
              <a id="link_23862897" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23862897,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Italian Theatre in Translation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23867960">
              <a id="link_23867960" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23867960,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Italian Theatre in Translation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20453286">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20453286">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20453286">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20453286">
          <div id="boxatt20453286" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23862901">
              <a id="link_23862901" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23862901,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Italian Theatre in Translation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20453287">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20453287">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20453287">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in articles and chapters
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20453287">
          <div id="boxatt20453287" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23862906">
              <a id="link_23862906" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23862906,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Italian Theatre in Translation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23862905">
              <a id="link_23862905" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23862905,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Italian Theatre in Translation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19008881}); ">
               Film and Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23867964">
              <a id="link_23867964" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23867964,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Italian Theatre in Translation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23862903">
              <a id="link_23862903" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23862903,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Italian Theatre in Translation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286586}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription databse. Archive of the full text of numerous history journals from major academic presses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23862904">
              <a id="link_23862904" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23862904,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Italian Theatre in Translation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717120}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23870154">
              <a id="link_23870154" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23870154,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Italian Theatre in Translation', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343609}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A full-text database with journal articles in the arts, humanities, and social sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5463899" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20453289">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20453289">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20453289">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources, plus annotations
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20453289">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            user guide
           </a>
           to Zotero. NOTE: In order to construct footnotes (as opposed to bibliography), the
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/support/word_processor_plugin_installation_for_zotero_2.1">
            MS Word Plug-In
           </a>
           is needed.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20453289" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20453290">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20453290">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20453290">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20453290">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20453290" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
